results.description: The opening round of 2020 Super League fixtures includes a repeat of the 2019 Grand Final between St Helens and Salford.

thumbnail.altText: St Helens lift the Super League Grand Final trophy

results.description: Super League Grand Finalists St Helens and Salford will meet again when Magic Weekend returns to Newcastle in May 2020.
results.shortTitle: Grand Final repeat on Magic Weekend
results.title: Magic Weekend: St Helens and Salford to meet in Grand Final repeat

results.description: Catalans Dragons and Warrington Wolves are fined following clashes between fans at their Super League match in August.

results.title: Catalans Dragons & Warrington Wolves fined after crowd clashes in Perpignan

results.description: Australia-born Blake Austin replaces the injured Jack Hughes in the England squad for the World Cup Nines tournament.

results.title: Blake Austin: Warrington Wolves half-back drafted into England Nines squad

results.description: Warrington Wolves back-rower Harvey Livett rejoins the Wire's Super League rivals Hull KR on a season-long loan.

results.title: Harvey Livett: Warrington Wolves back-rower rejoins Hull KR on season-long loan

results.description: Warrington Wolves sign centres Anthony Gelling and Keanan Brand from Championship side Widnes Vikings.

results.title: Warrington Wolves: Super League club sign Anthony Gelling & Keanan Brand from Widnes

results.description: Five clubs will be involved in Super League's new play-off system and hope to reach the Grand Final on 12 October.

thumbnail.altText: Wigan Warriors win the 2018 Grand Final

results.description: After his professional rugby league career was ended by injury, boxing now fills the competitive void for Mick Learmonth.

results.title: Mick Learmonth: Ex-rugby league player trading passes for punches in boxing

results.description: Castleford end Warrington's season with a hard-fought elimination final victory against the Challenge Cup holders.

results.description: Warrington's Blake Austin is among five nominees named for the 2019 Steve Prescott Man of Steel award.

results.description: Leeds end their season with a victory over Warrington, who are pipped to third place by Salford.

results.description: Warrington are fined £2,000 by the Rugby Football League for making a late change to their Challenge Cup semi-final squad.

results.description: Ken Sio-inspired Salford are patient to beat Challenge Cup winners Warrington 22-6 and move up to third in Super League.
